channel.title: model-predictive-control on Vuong V. Trinh
channel.description: Recent content in model-predictive-control on Vuong V. Trinh

item.title: Innovative Advanced Control of Large Cryogenic Systems
item.description: The ANR CRYOGREEN project gathers collaborative academic and industrial partners, including GIPSA-lab, CEA and CERN. We target to advanced control of large cryogenic systems via explicit nonlinear and hierarchical distributed model predictive control frameworks.

item.title: Innovative Stand-Alone Solar Micro Power Plant
item.description: Fast nonlinear constrained control of a Stirling engine Process diagram Fast explicit constrained control synthesis Real-time validation
